entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is described as a cat who hissed and landed on the floor. He has a bottlebrush tail in the air.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a student who is hurrying up the spiral staircase to his dormitory. He wants to grab the Invisibility Cloak and go back to the library.

relationships.description: Harry gives a disgusted look to Crookshanks, who is described as landing on the floor and stalking away with his tail in the air.
